name: Familiar (Robin, Hlywa, Nora Hébert, tenkain, Zhaudi)
name_original: Familiar (Robin, Hlywa, Nora Hébert, tenkain, Zhaudi)
description:
Play as Rin the cat, who must puzzle out ways to help soothe and cheer up her magical girl owner Priya.

Navigating conversations can be difficult, especially when someone is dealing with a heavy emotional burden. Luckily no one knows us better than our dearest friends or in Priya's case, her familiar Rin. They always look for just the thing to put her at ease.

Made for Code Coven and UN Women UK's Safe Spaces Jam, this game is an attempt to model what a supportive conversation could look like when talking to a victim of harassment. 

Content warning: This game contains mentions of harassment, but does not go into explicit detail. Take care.
